og.title: Kevin Gleason: Finally a legit team to cheer

twitter.description: Boy do I hope this new semi-pro soccer team in Kingston, the Kingston Stockade FC, makes it through a full season without going belly up.That’s pretty much the new standard for me regarding minor-league teams popping up around here. One season. Get me through an entire season without bouncing checks, forfeiting games, chasing away players, fighting with town officials and becoming an overall nuisance, and you have yourself a fan.Delano-Hitch Stadium in Newburgh alone has had more minor-
twitter.title: Kevin Gleason: Finally a legit team to cheer
